Package au.csiro.pathling.update

Class UpdateProvider

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.update.UpdateProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
IResourceProvider
@Component @Scope("prototype") @Profile("server") public class UpdateProvider extends Object implements IResourceProvider
HAPI resource provider that provides update-related operations, such as create and update.
Author:
John Grimes, Sean Fong
